alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Thomas, northeastern Logan, southern Sheridan, southern Graham and Gove Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 949 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Palco to 3 miles north of Collyer to near Oakley. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Thomas, northeastern Logan, southern Sheridan, southern Graham and Gove Counties, including the following locations... Saint Peter. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 74 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
